WebhookUrl.label: Discord Webhook Url
WebhookUrl.tooltip: Create a webhook on your discord server (Server Settings -> Webhooks) then copy the url into this text box.

Subreddit.label: Subreddit
Subreddit.tooltip: Specify the subreddit from which to pull memes.

StartHour.label: Earliest time - Hour
StartHour.tooltip: Specify the earliest time in hours at which to post a meme (in local time).

StartMinute.label: Earliest time - Minute
StartMinute.tooltip: Specify the earliest time in minutes at which to post a meme (in local time).

EndHour.label: Latest time - Hour
EndHour.tooltip: Specify the latest time in hours at which to post a meme (in local time).

EndMinute.label: Latest time - Minute
EndMinute.tooltip: Specify the latest time in minutes at which to post a meme (in local time).

PostFormat.label: Post Format
PostFormat.tooltip: Modify the json format if you so desire.

OpenJson.label: Open Json in Formatter
OpenJson.tooltip: Opens json on codebeautify.org to help with editing. Minify and paste back into above textbox when done editing.
